titles.title: National Lighthouse Museum Act
To provide for the establishment of the National Lighthouse Museum.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Public Buildings and Economic Development.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 11/7/1997--Introduced. National Lighthouse Museum Act - Establishes a National Lighthouse Museum Commission to: (1) develop a fund raising plan, acquire a site, and draft an operational proposal for establishing a National Lighthouse Museum at a lighthouse-related site within the United States and listed on the National Register of Historic Places; and (2) establish the National Lighthouse Museum Corporation to direct and control the Museum.
